Html:
Might you have any suggestions or hints for how to overlay the weather on the map? In other words, is there any weather service that is readily doing this? Or perhaps a service that I could call, passing it a lat/lon value, a date/time range, etc? 

Thanks...
i don't know about services, but there is Demo.Clouds where i use image for weather overlay, so the issue is to somehow generate that image dynamically

Thanks!  On Jul 1, you responded to someone and said, "check the source, i've included Demo.Clouds ;}"

Where can I get the source that you were referring to so that I can see what you have done with it?

Appreciate the help!!!
